pages.text: $(li)The Chorus Fruit on a Stick can be use to ride an $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/endergrade)Endergrade$(/l).$(br)$(li)To ride a Endergrade, first you have to equip a $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/saddle)Saddle$(/l) to this creature.
$(li)Then, right click to the Endergrade to ride it.$(br)$(li)Now just hold the Chorus Fruit on a Stick in your hand to make walk your Endergrade in any direction.
